description: MainActivity.kt file for an Android application using Kotlin. It manages bottom navigation between Home and Cart fragments, updates a badge based on cart item count, and provides public methods to navigate to the menu and cart tab programmatically.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Activity managing bottom navigation and fragment transactions for the main UI.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes UI components, sets up observers for cart item count, and default fragment.

methods.name: navigateHome
methods.description: Replaces current fragment with the HomeFragment.

methods.name: navigateCart
methods.description: Replaces current fragment with the CartFragment.

methods.name: openMenu
methods.description: Public method to open the MenuFragment for a specific restaurant.

methods.name: openCartTab
methods.description: Public method to switch to the cart tab programmatically.
